news_header: Three stocks with strong value characteristics and buy rank for investors to consider.
news_text: On January 30, three stocks are highlighted for investors: Origin Bancorp, Inc. (OBK) has a Zacks Rank #1 and a P/E ratio of 13.97, with earnings estimates up by 13.9%. Sandvik AB (SDVKY) also has a Zacks Rank #1, a P/E ratio of 16.67, and earnings estimates up by 69.3%. Concrete Pumping Holdings, Inc. (BBCP) carries a Zacks Rank #1, a P/E ratio of 19.40, and earnings estimates up by 38.7%. All three companies possess strong value scores, making them attractive options for investors.
